content: this dish scrubbie is going to become your go to scrubbie made with tulle it cleans very effectively and it can be used for getting most things clean you don t have to worry about being too rough with it i ve used mine for over a year without any issues i love to give these little scrubbies as gifts to be used as a helpful cleaning aid these scrubbies are made up of two circles that are seamed together with a slip_stitch these are incredibly quick to make using a large hook and tulle you can make a couple in less than an hour there is one size given that is about the standard scrubbie size you will notice that there is no gauge given as gauge is not important in this pattern this pattern is beginner friendly using basic stitches and it includes a photo tutorial which is at the end of the pattern this pattern requires a 6 roll of tulle 25 yds that looks like this 1 i recommend buying this brand each scrubbie uses half a roll so you can make two out of one roll 1 https //www walmart com/ip/fuzhou-unbrand-6-red-matte-tulle-25-yards-100-polyester-by-the-bolt/107673427 you may sell any finished products but if you share on social media please link the pattern and give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry if you find any pattern errors or have any questions please message me on ravelry @stopitharry enjoy one thing that would be helpful to me as a newbie designer would be for you to rate the pattern when you are finished i would also love social media shares and pattern reviews in your notes thanks in advance
